page.title: 08AGRICULTURE II
page.content:
The crops need care if they are going to live. Potatoes,barley,turnips and wheat all need sprayed against diseases which they are most likely to get. Barley and wheat need sprayed against mildew, potatoes need sprayed against blight,and turnips need sprayed against flea beetles. The wheat and barley also need sprayed against twitch which is a kind of weed that spreads easily.
THE GRAIN CYCLE First the farmers plough the land to kill all the weeds,then harrow it to loosen soil,then sow the seeds with a dibbler then harrow it again,then roll it.When its ready to harvest, farmers combine the crop and cart in the grain in a trailer to the auger which puts the grain in a bin for storage.
